com.google.appinventor.client.youngandroid
Class CodeblocksConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.jsonp.JsonpConnection
      com.google.appinventor.client.youngandroid.CodeblocksConnection

public class CodeblocksConnection
extends JsonpConnection

CodeblocksConnection provides methods for communicating from the ODE client to a codeblocks JavaWebStart instance. Connections are managed by the CodeblocksManager.

Author:
sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

CodeblocksConnection

public CodeblocksConnection(JsonpConnectionInfo connInfo,
                            JSONParser jsonParser,
                            com.google.common.base.Function<String,String> escapeQueryParameterFunction)
Creates a CodeblocksConnection object with the given connection information, JSON parser, and escape function.

Parameters:
connInfo - the JSONP connection information
jsonParser - the JSON parser
escapeQueryParameterFunction - the escape function
Method Detail

generateYail

public void generateYail()
Sends a JSONP request to codeblocks to sync the form properties and then generate new YAIL in order to show any problems (like empty sockets) to the user.

reloadProperties

public void reloadProperties(AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sends a JSONP request to codeblocks to tell it to reload properties.

                                    String assetsPath,

Sends a JSONP request to codeblocks to tell it to load properties and blocks.

public void clearCodeblocks(AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sends a JSONP request to codeblocks to tell it clear its workspace.

public void saveCodeblocksSource(AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sends a JSONP request to codeblocks to tell it to save its current workspaces

syncProperty

public void syncProperty(String componentName,
                         String componentType,
                         String propertyName,
                         String propertyValue,
                         AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sync a single component property with codeblocks

Parameters:
componentName - the name of the component
componentType - the type of the component
propertyName - the name of the property
propertyValue - the value of the property
callback - a callback to pass along to the connection
